title: Approve a PTO Request
description: A manager needs to approve a vacation request submitted by one of their direct reports.

tasks.description: Access the pending time-off requests in the HRIS manager self-service portal.
tasks.expected_outcome: Manager successfully navigates to the approval queue.

tasks.description: Review the employee's request and check the team calendar for potential conflicts.
tasks.expected_outcome: Manager sees no conflicts with other team members' time off.

tasks.description: Approve the time-off request in the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Manager clicks 'Approve', which notifies the employee and updates their leave balance.
